h2_title: How to Get the Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang Spirit
content: **There is one frog boss in each chapter. You must defeat all of them to collect enough Tadpoles to fully upgrade Baw-Li-Guh-Yang and unlock Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang.**
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'How to Get the Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
**There is one frog boss in each chapter. You must defeat all of them to collect enough Tadpoles to fully upgrade Baw-Li-Guh-Yang and unlock Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang.**
